name: opds-web-client-build
description: Build scripts for the OPDS web client
author: NYPL

scripts.prepublish: cd packages/opds-web-client && npm link && cd ../server && npm link opds-browser && npm install
scripts.dev: npm run dev-serve | npm run dev-build
scripts.prod: cd packages/opds-web-client && npm run prod && cd ../server && npm run start
